sobreMi.title: ABOUT ME
sobreMi.paragraph1: Since I was a child, I have always been fascinated by the world of technology. During the pandemic, observing the rise of technological careers and the possibility of working from a computer, I decided to dive into the universe of programming.
sobreMi.paragraph2: Today, I am a frontend developer with solid skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as experience in frameworks like React and libraries like Bootstrap and SASS.
sobreMi.paragraph3: I am excited to take the next step in my professional career, bringing motivation, energy, and a great passion for technology and web development.
